content:
Yes‚ÄîI can see Coin/archive and its contents.

## üìÅ Coin/archive contents
- docker/
  - install_docker_monero.yml
  - install_p2pool.yml
  - install_xmrig.yml
- logging_miner.yml
- monitor_miners.yml
- monitor_output.log
- monitor_error.log (empty)
- .DS_Store

## üîé Notes
- The docker folder holds three playbooks/manifests related to Monero, P2Pool, and XMRig.
- monitor_output.log is large (about 1.8 MB); monitor_error.log is empty.
- .DS_Store is a macOS metadata file.
